data.title: AMAnaT
data.text:
Q: What is the rate of Ansar chanda?

A: Roughly speaking it is 1.1% of your annual take home pay. We recommend you use the calculator to determine the exact amount.

Q: How can I get a copy of an old donation receipt?

A: We're constantly improving self-service features to allow members to make such requests. For now, please contact Qaid Mal at qaid.mal@ansarusa.org with as much detail as possible like your name, ami code, amount, date, etc.
